articles.description: ITC’s Q1 revenue was in line with Street estimates and analysts anticipate sustainable growth in ITC’s cigarette business going ahead and hence, most brokerages have raised ITC share price target after Q1 results.
articles.content:
ITC share price fell in early trade on Friday after the cigarette makers Q1 results missed Street estimates. ITC share price fell as much as 2.29% to 482.40 apiece on the BSE.
